text: The literature search was conducted from 1994 up to December 2021 in PubMed/MEDLINE, Embase and Scopus, and the references of included studies were also searched for additional sources of evidence.Random effects meta-analyses were conducted on the absolute clinical sensitivity and specificity of dual-stain cytology and of the relative sensitivity and specificity of dual-stain cytology compared with conventionally stained cytology, considering cytology at the cut-off of or exceeding atypical squamous cells of undetermined significance (ASCUS) and considering $\mathsf { C l N } 2 +$ or $\mathsf { C l N 3 + }$ as disease outcome.
